adverb.description: In a way that is secure and reliable.
In a way that is based on valid reason or good judgment.
examples: there is soundly based reason for optimism

adverb.description: (with reference to sleep) deeply and without disturbance.
examples: I slept soundly for the first time since I've been here

adverb.description: In a thorough or decisive manner.
examples: Jim was soundly defeated by his old opponent
